6.1 Introduction

Once connected to an X server, a client can use CLX functions to perform graphic operations on drawables.

This section describes CLX functions to:

  • Operate on areas and planes
  • Draw points
  • Draw lines
  • Draw rectangles
  • Draw arcs
  • Draw text
